name: 紅雀
message: "...Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uhh... Nmm..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba, wake up. It's already ten."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mnnnnm..."
After a minute or two of gentle rocking, I finally open my eyes.
I'm sooo tired. The last thing I want is to get up.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Five more minutes..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Nope. You said that five minutes ago. You always say that, but you never get up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Four more minutes..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Nope."

name: 蒼葉
message: "One minute..."

name: 紅雀
message: "A-o-ba. If you don't get up, I'm gonna do things to you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mnn... Whatever..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Man."
Koujaku lets out a frustrated laugh, and then I feel the bed shift.
Just as I'm wondering what's going on...

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba. Wake up!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mn... Huh?! Aha-ahahahaha! Hey! Koujaku!"
He suddenly starts tickling my sides, and that knocks the drowsiness right out of me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ahaha! Eeek! Okay! Knock it off! I'm up! I'm up! Stop it!"
I writhe and scream until Koujaku finally stops.
That asshole! Tickling me while I was still half-asleep!
As I struggle to catch my breath, Koujaku wraps his arms around me from behind.
He rests his chin on my shoulder.

name: 紅雀
message: "You're really not a morning person."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm just tired. What do you want?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, can't blame you there. I think you've gotten worse since you started staying over, though."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah?"
Lately, I've been spending the night at Koujaku's about three times a week.
The main reason is that going home every night is a pain in the ass, but also...
Well, I still live with Granny, so it's a little awkward...
It's been three months since we got together.
Somehow, it feels like both ages and no time at all.
Maybe that's because we were friends to begin with. Not all that much has changed.
Koujaku still comes over for dinner, and he's started cutting hair again too.
...Still, I can't be certain Granny hasn't caught on.

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh, I get it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: 紅雀
message: "The real reason you sleep in so much. It's because you want me to pay attention to you."
Koujaku squeezes me tight and ruffles my hair.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Dream on."

name: 紅雀
message: "I love how your hair feels. Nice work, if I do say so myself."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That tickles!"
Thanks to Koujaku, I have short hair for the first time in my life.
Even touching my hair was always painful, so I was sure that cutting it would hurt like hell.
But when the time finally came, the sensation had largely left my hair. It was almost anticlimactic how little pain there ended up being.
That said, it was my first time getting a haircut, so it did feel a bit strange.
I can still hear the sound of the scissors.
No matter how many times I told him it didn't hurt, Koujaku still took the utmost care.
And that's why it took two whole hours to finish it. Well, I'm just glad Koujaku got to have his fun.
By the way, he put my hair clippings into a paulownia box, saying he'd treasure them forever.
I'm sure it comes as no surprise that I thought this was a touch creepy at first, but Koujaku convinced me that the hair held a lot of sentimental value for him.
Ultimately, I gave in.

name: 紅雀
message: "Used to having short hair yet?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "The back of my neck feels cold... And my head feels too light."

name: 紅雀
message: "You'll get used to it... fuu..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh! Don't blow on me!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Haha!"
I lean into Koujaku to shield the back of my neck. He pats the top of my head in response.

name: 紅雀
message: "This doesn't hurt anymore, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "It's kind of weird. I mean, it used to bother you so much."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. It's pretty weird for me too."

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, I'm fucking stoked that I get to touch your hair all I want now."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, and now my hair's always a mess."

name: 紅雀
message: "I always fix it after, don't I? ...Actually, there's something I've been dyin' to ask you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah?"

name: 紅雀
message: "So was I your, uh... first?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? First what?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You know. Your first 'experience.'"
...Where's this coming from?
I give Koujaku the dirtiest look I can manage.

I thought it might fluster him a little, but no, he looks serious.

Well, now I'm the one feeling awkward.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Well, you were my first guy."
Koujaku is visibly relieved, which kind of pisses me off.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell? What's the big deal?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Nothing?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nothing, my ass. What do you take me for?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I didn't mean it like that. It's just, you were so cute when you were a kid. You kinda looked like a girl, you know? I guess I can't shake that impression."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, now I look like a dude no matter how hard you squint. That's not funny."

name: 紅雀
message: "Actually, I think you're still kinda..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Juuuust kidding. I swear! I was just gonna say I still think you're as cute as you were back then."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is that your idea of a compliment?"
Koujaku cracks a funny smile and strokes my hair again.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay, now you answer. Was I your first?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You're asking me? If I've been with guys?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "No way. Obviously, you were my first. Don't worry, you're special."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You sure talk big for a guy who started bleeding in the middle of the act."

name: 紅雀
message: "Ngh! Hey! I can't believe you're still... That doesn't even happen anymore!"
Koujaku shoots me a baleful glare.
Ahh. Revenge is sweet.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh yeah. Do you have work today?"

name: 紅雀
message: "In the afternoon."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay, meet me at the shop once you're done. I wanna have dinner at my place tonight."

name: 紅雀
message: "Got it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No chasing skirts, you hear?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I won't. You know I don't do that anymore."
Now that we're a couple, Koujaku has completely stopped hooking up with girls.
I mean, he's still nice to his fans, but he's stopped having them over or taking them on dates.
He got really mad the one time I asked him if he was just resisting the urge out of respect for me.
Apparently, he doesn't have eyes for anyone else now that he has the man of his dreams.
...Man, how embarrassing.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, I'm finally awake. I'm gonna make some food, so move your ass."

name: 紅雀
message: "Mhm."
But instead of letting go, he just buries his face deeper into my collarbone.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku?"

name: 紅雀
message: "How you feeling these days? Like those headaches and stuff. Are they gone now?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah. Seems that way. I've been feeling really good lately."
My headaches completely disappeared after the tower collapsed. I stopped hearing his voice too.
But I feel that he hasn't vanished completely.
After all... he's part of me.
All I ever really wanted was to live a peaceful life with Granny.
But during my time in Platinum Jail, I learned a lot about myself... I learned what despair was.
I learned about my power. The power to destroy people. It felt like a curse, not a blessing.
When the other me tried to take control, I was ready to give in.
If I couldn't live a normal life, what did anything matter?
...But it was Koujaku who changed my mind.
He reminded me that it was my power that brought him back.
I think that's what gave me the strength to fight.
Koujaku freed me. He destroyed the part of me trapped in despair.
I don't know if he'll ever resurface again, but I'm not scared anymore.
Now, I have Koujaku.

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, if anything changes, make sure you tell me right away. I've made up my mind..."
He squeezes me tight.

name: 紅雀
message: "...I'm gonna treasure you for the rest of my life."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Man, stop acting like a dumbass. Look, I'm up, so get off me. I'm making something to eat."

name: 紅雀
message: "You're gonna have to drag me to the kitchen."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Get off!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Ow!"
For all our horsing around, I'm deeply grateful to have Koujaku by my side.
Everything has changed, and yet, nothing has.
Being together like this, like always...<k> means more to me than anything.
